programme.desc: Startup Sarawak brings together digital entrepreneurs and other stakeholders in promoting the development of digital startup companies and initiatives in positioning Sarawak as the preferred startup hub for technology and entrepreneurs development.

programme.title: Makan Nyaman Ep4
programme.desc: Makan Nyaman is a lively TVS cooking show with Chef Imelda, exploring Sarawaks flavors through classic, modern, and fusion dishes. She shares unique ingredients, cultural stories, and easy recipes to inspire home cooking.

programme.title: (L) TVS Nightline
programme.desc: Memaparkan laporan peristiwa yang berlaku di seluruh Malaysia dalam bahasa English

programme.title: Kenyalang Badminton Talent Ep2
programme.desc: Dengan aspirasi dan inisiatif ini, kami amat berharap untuk mencari bakat-bakat pemain baru Badminton Sarawak seterusnya meningkatkan pembangunan dan perkembangan sukan Badminton di Sarawak

programme.title: Adventure of The Lens Ep5
programme.desc: What does it take to capture the perfect shot in the wild? In every episode of Kembara Kanta, take an intimate journey with our local wildlife photographers as they search for their own perfect wildlife photo.

programme.title: Just Wanna Dance Ep7
programme.desc: 4 penari dari gaya tarian yang berbeza, latar belakang dan kumpulan umur berkumpul,meluaskan ufuk dengan mencabar diri untuk mengalami dan mempelajari genre tarian berbeza,tarian budaya dan tradisi Borneo

programme.title: My Health, My Choice Ep12
programme.desc: My Health, My Choice explores daily practices, behaviors, and health issues, highlighting factors like attitudes, diet, environment, and relationships, and provides practical solutions.

programme.title: Jom Camping Ep8
programme.desc: Program travelog yang meneroka pelbagai bentuk dan jenis perkhemahan berbeza selain berjalan ke lokasilokasi perkhemahan di negeri Sarawak bersama dua anak jati Sarawak, El Baharin dan Anaz Zawawi.

programme.title: Kek & Pastri Ep11
programme.desc: Seorang selebriti, menghasilkan resepi baharu untuk kek, pastri, dan hidangan savouri dengan menggunakan bahan-bahan tempatan dan teknik membakar dan mengukus untuk mencipta hidangan yang lazat & inovatif

programme.title: Lombak Rindok Go Ep9
programme.desc: Sebuah rancangan realiti yang memukau, menggabungkan elemen perjuangan, kerjasama, dan strategi dalam sebuah perlumbaan yang mendebarkan dari awal hingga akir.

programme.title: Pewaris Legasi Ep9
programme.desc: Dalam kebimbangan minat remaja pada kerjaya kraftangan, pewaris gigih menjaga warisan ini. Rancangan ini memaparkan kerjaya kraftangan di Malaysia, menyeru penonton menghargai usaha mempertahankannya demi generasi akan datang.

programme.title: Rezeki Angin Ep1
programme.desc: Siri ini membawa kita mengenali unsur alam iaitu elemen angin dalam kisah rakyat jelata mencari rezeki. Siri ini adalah pelengkap kepada elemen air, tanah dan api yang diperkenalkan pada siri sebelum ini.

programme.title: The Food That Binds The Nation Ep9
programme.desc: Sebuah dokumentari kembara gastronomi yang merentas dari Perlis ke Sarawak, memperkenalkan keunikan juadah berbilang budaya yang memupuk perpaduan dalam kepelbagaian selera.

programme.title: Faces Of Borneo Ep13
programme.desc: This series searches Borneo for top models, aged 16-25, competing for RM10,000. Castings in Sabah, Sarawak & Brunei (Ep1-3) lead to challenges (Ep4-12). Judged on beauty, passion, and skills, finalists face eliminations till one wins!

programme.title: Kenyalang Badminton Talent Ep2
programme.desc: Dengan aspirasi dan inisiatif ini, kami amat berharap untuk mencari bakat-bakat pemain baru Badminton Sarawak seterusnya meningkatkan pembangunan dan perkembangan sukan Badminton di Sarawak

programme.title: Paradoks Ep12
programme.desc: Zainal Nuruddin, pemilik studio rakaman, kagum dengan muzik kugiran kaki lima, lalu bekerjasama dengan Ali Zayn, pemuda misteri yang rupanya Pengembara Masa. Cinta Ali pada anak Zainal, Syaheera, mencetus dilema besar.

programme.title: My Health, My Choice Ep12
programme.desc: My Health, My Choice explores daily practices, behaviors, and health issues, highlighting factors like attitudes, diet, environment, and relationships, and provides practical solutions.

programme.title: (L) TVS Pagi
programme.desc: TVS Pagi membawakan perkembangan menyeluruh dari dalam dan luar negara.

programme.title: Ready, Set, Go Kids! Ep8
programme.desc: "Ready, Set, Go Kids!" is a children's educational program where they travel to Kuching, complete challenges, and win prizes, while learning about the local culture.

programme.title: Hantu Tenggek
programme.desc: Sekumpulan penipu yang diketuai oleh Tariq yang berpura-pura mengusir tempat berhantu telah diperas ugut oleh Tuan Sidek, seorang pemaju bangunan. Mereka perlu meyakinkan pesaing Tuan Sidek bahawa bangunan tertentu berhantu apabila mereka terperangkap di dalamnya. Kecuali mereka tidak perlu meyakinkan kerana bangunan itu benar-benar dihantui oleh roh yang tidak tenteram. Roh memerlukan bantuan mereka untuk memenuhi hasrat terakhirnya

programme.title: Rock 4:Rockers Never Die
programme.desc: Band rock baharu RIMBA BARA 2 memulakan perjalanan untuk menghidupkan semula legasi RIMBA BARA dengan bantuan pengurus mereka, Dio (bekas roadie RIMBA BARA).

programme.title: Tayangan Perdana Wok
programme.desc: Nazri berdepan situasi getir apabila isterinya, Bella, dan anaknya, Ayu, tanpa sengaja membunuh Johan, lelaki yang mengganggu Ayu. Dalam keadaan terdesak, mereka memutuskan untuk menyembunyikan mayat Johan. Dengan sedikit pengalaman dalam menghadapi situasi sukar, Nazri merangka alibi untuk keluarganya agar tidak ditangkap oleh polis, dengan bantuan Ray, pekerja upahan di rumahnya. Namun, Ray mula menunjukkan sisi gelapnya apabila dia mengancam mereka dengan video pembunuhan Johan yang dirakam secara rahsia. Dalam usaha menyelamatkan keluarganya, Nazri terpaksa berjuang melawan Ray, yang sebenarnya adalah seorang sosiopat berbahaya

programme.title: Anak Jalanan Reborn
programme.desc: Boy mengalami kemalangan yang menyebabkan dia menjalani rawatan di hospital selama setahun. Sementara itu, Reva, kekasih Boy, meninggalkan dunia geng motosikal dan kini bekerja di syarikat milik mendiang ayahnya sebagai pengarah utama.

programme.title: Bukan Cinta Malaikat
programme.desc: Berasal dari Bandung, Reyhan pergi ke kawasan konflik di Timur Tengah untuk kerja sukarela. Di sana, dia membantu seorang wanita Malaysia bernama Dewi dan jatuh cinta padanya. Apabila Dewi kembali ke negaranya, Reyhan memutuskan untuk mencarinya dan melamarnya. Namun, Dewi sudah mempunyai kekasih. Sementara itu, rakan zaman kanak-kanak Reyhan, Aliyah, turut menyimpan perasaan terhadapnya.

programme.title: Tayangan Perdana Alibi
programme.desc: Nazri berdepan situasi getir apabila isterinya, Bella, dan anaknya, Ayu, tanpa sengaja membunuh Johan, lelaki yang mengganggu Ayu. Dalam keadaan terdesak, mereka memutuskan untuk menyembunyikan mayat Johan. Dengan sedikit pengalaman dalam menghadapi situasi sukar, Nazri merangka alibi untuk keluarganya agar tidak ditangkap oleh polis, dengan bantuan Ray, pekerja upahan di rumahnya. Namun, Ray mula menunjukkan sisi gelapnya apabila dia mengancam mereka dengan video pembunuhan Johan yang dirakam secara rahsia. Dalam usaha menyelamatkan keluarganya, Nazri terpaksa berjuang melawan Ray, yang sebenarnya adalah seorang sosiopat berbahaya

programme.title: Tayangan Perdana Wok
programme.desc: Nazri berdepan situasi getir apabila isterinya, Bella, dan anaknya, Ayu, tanpa sengaja membunuh Johan, lelaki yang mengganggu Ayu. Dalam keadaan terdesak, mereka memutuskan untuk menyembunyikan mayat Johan. Dengan sedikit pengalaman dalam menghadapi situasi sukar, Nazri merangka alibi untuk keluarganya agar tidak ditangkap oleh polis, dengan bantuan Ray, pekerja upahan di rumahnya. Namun, Ray mula menunjukkan sisi gelapnya apabila dia mengancam mereka dengan video pembunuhan Johan yang dirakam secara rahsia. Dalam usaha menyelamatkan keluarganya, Nazri terpaksa berjuang melawan Ray, yang sebenarnya adalah seorang sosiopat berbahaya

programme.title: Abang Long Fadil 1
programme.desc: Abang Long Fadil, seorang lelaki yang sentiasa berangan bahawa kehidupannya seperti seorang gangster. Namun, apabila sahabat baiknya, Malik, dipenjarakan, pelbagai kekacauan mula tercetus dan angan-angannya mungkin tidak lagi jauh dari realiti.

programme.title: Adnan Sempit Generasi GIG
programme.desc: Selepas menyelamatkan Nadia (Afifah Nasir), seorang wanita moden yang telah lama diminatinya, Adnan (Aiman Tino), seorang penghantar makanan, mula jatuh cinta tanpa menyedari bahawa dia mungkin terperangkap dalam rancangan tersembunyi wanita tersebut.

programme.title: Adnan Sempit Sawadikap
programme.desc: mengisahkan Adnan (Shaheizy Sam) yang lucu, bersama isteri dan anaknya, memulakan perjalanan ke Thailand bersama sahabat baik mereka, Bobby dan Wawa, di mana pelbagai lagi pengembaraan menanti.

programme.title: Jangan Pandang Belakang Congkak 2
programme.desc: Setelah berjaya memulihkan Punai (Cat Farish), Asmat (Lan Pet-pet) dan Johan (Shaheizy Sam) serta berjaya menewaskan Mustika dalam JPBC yang lalu, Pak Mor yang cedera itu terus menuju ke anak sungai. Pak Mor dibantu oleh Mustika (Lisa Surihani) dan berpakat untuk merampas harta Pak Sudir.

programme.title: Bini-biniku Gangster
programme.desc: Manja dan Herry adalah sepasang suami isteri yang sangat romantik dan saling sayang menyayangi. Tanpa disedari oleh Herry, Manja adalah ketua kumpulan kepada sebuah geng gengster di Kuala Lumpur. Di pejabat,Herry kerap dibuli Mat Saja termasuk menyuruh Herry menggantikan tempatnya semasa ulangtahun perkahwinan Manja dan Herry yang ke2. Manja bengang lalu menghantar orang-orangnya memukul Mat Saja.

programme.title: Adnan Sempit 2
programme.desc: Mengisahkan tentang Adnan, seorang penunggang motosikal jalanan yang yatim piatu dan dijaga oleh bibinya. Di pihak lain, Nadia dilahirkan dalam keluarga yang kaya dan kini memiliki pekerjaan yang stabil. Kedua-dua individu yang berlatarbelakangkan dunia yang berbeza ini akhirnya bertemu secara kebetulan dan terjalin hubungan antara mereka.

programme.title: Adnan Sempit 3
programme.desc: Menyaksikan Adnan berkahwin dengan cinta zaman kanak-kanaknya, Nadia, manakala Bobby pula berkahwin dengan Wawa. Adnan juga semakin mahir menguruskan perniagaannya sendiri. Walau bagaimanapun, kedua-dua pasangan ini segera menyedari bahawa perkahwinan bukan sekadar berkongsi rumah bersama seseorang, tetapi lebih daripada itu.

programme.title: Tayangan Perdana Alibi
programme.desc: Nazri berdepan situasi getir apabila isterinya, Bella, dan anaknya, Ayu, tanpa sengaja membunuh Johan, lelaki yang mengganggu Ayu. Dalam keadaan terdesak, mereka memutuskan untuk menyembunyikan mayat Johan. Dengan sedikit pengalaman dalam menghadapi situasi sukar, Nazri merangka alibi untuk keluarganya agar tidak ditangkap oleh polis, dengan bantuan Ray, pekerja upahan di rumahnya. Dalam usaha menyelamatkan keluarganya, Nazri terpaksa berjuang melawan Ray, yang sebenarnya adalah seorang sosiopat berbahaya

programme.title: Takut Ke Tak?
programme.desc: Lima pelajar jurusan filem merancang untuk melakukan penggambaran di sebuah rumah berhantu, namun satu demi satu kejadian yang sama seperti kebanyakan filem seram berlaku kepada mereka lalu mereka perlu membuat keputusan penting takut ke tak?

programme.title: Hantu Tenggek
programme.desc: Sekumpulan penipu yang diketuai oleh Tariq yang berpura-pura mengusir tempat berhantu telah diperas ugut oleh Tuan Sidek, seorang pemaju bangunan. Apabila Dewi kembali ke negaranya, Reyhan memutuskan untuk mencarinya dan melamarnya. Namun, Dewi sudah mempunyai kekasih. Sementara itu, rakan zaman kanak-kanak Reyhan, Aliyah, turut menyimpan perasaan terhadapnya.

programme.title: Mereka Yang Pergi Ep6
programme.desc: Mengungkap kisah-kisah menyentuh hati di sekeliling kita, tentang mereka yang kehilangan insan tersayang. Mampukah mereka kembali dalam kehangatan keluarga?

programme.title: Festival Ramadan 2022 Ep24
programme.desc: Keseronokan pencarian bakat memberi warna pada bulan yang penuh barakah ini! Kami bawakan kepada anda Qasidah, Marawis, dan pelbagai keunikan dan hiburan.

programme.title: Qari Cilik Season 3 Ep44
programme.desc: Qari Cilik Indonesia kembali untuk musim ketiga, menampilkan kanak-kanak berbakat dalam seni tilawah Al-Quran. Saksikan perjalanan para peserta muda dalam menyampaikan bacaan yang indah dan penuh makna.

programme.title: Cewek Ke-33 Makin Bikin Jatuh Cinta
programme.desc: Aulia dipecat sekali lagi kerana bertengkar dengan nenek yang dijaganya, yang telah berlaku sebanyak 33 kali. Walaupun Kiki, pengurusnya, berasa marah, dia masih mempertahankan pekerjaan Aulia kerana persahabatannya dengan Kiki sejak kecil. Aulia kemudian diberikan peluang terakhir untuk merawat Marco, seorang fotografer terkenal yang baru sembuh daripada kemalangan.

programme.title: Konser Pestaria
programme.desc: Konsert Pestaria: Gabungan eklektik gaya muzik dan kolaborasi menarik di pentas!

programme.title: Cinta Setelah Cinta S2 Ep73
programme.desc: Starla menyangka dia telah menghadapi segalanya, tetapi penipuan Niko jauh lebih mendalam daripada yang disangkanya. Ketika dia terus berusaha mempertahankan perkahwinannya, ancaman baharu muncul. Ayu, yang masih taksub dengan Niko, semakin mengikatnya dalam perangkap dengan menggunakan anak mereka yang belum lahir sebagai umpan. Pada masa yang sama, naluri Starla merasakan ada sesuatu yang tidak kena, dan dia mula diburu oleh bayang-bayang serta rahsia gelap. Dengan keluarganya di ambang bahaya dan emosinya semakin tertekan, adakah Starla mampu melindungi orang-orang tersayang? Atau adakah pengkhianatan Niko akan mendorongnya melangkaui batas yang tidakbolehkembali?

programme.title: Qari Cilik Season 3 Ep45
programme.desc: Qari Cilik Indonesia kembali untuk musim ketiga, menampilkan kanak-kanak berbakat dalam seni tilawah Al-Quran. Saksikan perjalanan para peserta muda dalam menyampaikan bacaan yang indah dan penuh makna.

programme.desc: Menceritakan kisah seorang gadis bernama Sakinah yang menjalani kehidupan penuh tekanan akibat fitnah dan dipaksa untuk berkahwin dengan seseorang yang tidak mencintainya. Tidak hanya itu, Sakinah juga dihalang untuk mengetahui siapa ibu kandungnya yang tega membuangnya.

Menampilkan keluarga "Bucin": keluarga Judika (Duma Riris, Cleo, Judeo) dan keluarga Lesti (Rizky Billar, Abang L), konsert kolaborasi ini menjanjikan malam penuh detik yang tidak dapat dilupakan.

programme.title: Di Antara Dua Cinta Ep59
programme.desc: Pada hari ulang tahun perkahwinan Shafira dan Rafael yang ke-2, Shafira dikejutkan dengan berita bahawa Rafael telah terlibat dalam satu kemalangan, dan jasadnya tidak ditemui. Beberapa tahun berlalu, Rafael akhirnya disahkan meninggal dunia. Shafira kemudian membuat keputusan untuk berkahwin semula dengan Julian. Namun, di puncak kebahagiaan perkahwinan mereka, Rafael tiba-tiba muncul kembali.

programme.title: Indahnya Kebersamaan Ep1
programme.desc: Indahnya Kebersamaan ialah sebuah program tausiah yang dikendalikan oleh Mellya Baskarani bersama Prof. Dr. K.H. Nasaruddin Umar, M.A. Program ini memberi fokus kepada pelbagai permasalahan yang sering dialami oleh masyarakat, termasuk isu dalam kehidupan berumah tangga.

programme.desc: Adel bertekad untuk mendapatkan kembali cinta Fahmi, walaupun dia sudah berumah tangga dengan Indah. Dengan memanfaatkan kesempitan kewangan keluarga Fahmi, Adel merancang pelbagai cara licik untuk merebutnya daripada Indah. Namun, sejauh mana Adel sanggup bertindak demi memiliki Fahmi semula?

programme.title: Cewek Ke-33 Makin Bikin Jatuh Cinta
programme.desc: Aulia dipecat sekali lagi kerana bertengkar dengan nenek yang dijaganya, yang telah berlaku sebanyak 33 kali. Walaupun Kiki, pengurusnya, berasa marah, dia masih mempertahankan pekerjaan Aulia kerana persahabatannya dengan Kiki sejak kecil. Aulia kemudian diberikan peluang terakhir untuk merawat Marco, seorang fotografer terkenal yang baru sembuh daripada kemalangan.

Fathir bekerja sebagai kontraktor, dan Sukma hanya seorang suri rumah. Pada suatu hari, Fathir menerima projek besar. Malangnya, terdapat masalah dengan projek itu. Masalah timbul apabila Zahra disahkan menghidap penyakit kronik. Doktor mencadangkan agar Zahra menjalani rawatan di Jakarta.

programme.desc: SCTV pada hari jadinya telah mengadakan sambutan penuh kasih untuk Ulang Tahun SCTV 34 Xtraordinary dengan tema D34R LOVE. Kerjasama Xtraordinary dengan barisan pemuzik yang hebat akan menjadi pertunjukan istimewa yang memukau mata penonton SCTV.

programme.title: Makan Terooos Ep24
programme.desc: Jelajahi kekayaan masakan yang menampilkan rasa autentik. Sertai kami dalam pengembaraan rasa di seluruh Indonesia, hanya di Makan Terooos, di mana setiap hidangan memiliki kisahnya sendiri.

programme.title: Bidadari Surgamu Ep222
programme.desc: Menceritakan kisah seorang gadis bernama Sakinah yang menjalani kehidupan penuh tekanan akibat fitnah dan dipaksa untuk berkahwin dengan seseorang yang tidak mencintainya. Tidak hanya itu, Sakinah juga dihalang untuk mengetahui siapa ibu kandungnya yang tega membuangnya.

programme.title: Habis Gelap Terbitlah Jalan Ke Hatimu
programme.desc: Siska sibuk mengurus ladang jagungnya setiap hari sambil menjual jagung bakar dan pelbagai produk berasaskan jagung. Namun hidupnya tiba tiba menjadi kacau apabila dia hampir melanggar seorang pemuda tampan, Rangga, ketika memandu lori pikap berisi muatan jagung. Lebih mengejutkan, Rangga sebenarnya telah dijodohkan dengannya oleh datuknya. Tetapi Siska tidak tahu niat sebenar Rangga. Sebaik sahaja mereka berkahwin, dia merancang untuk menjual ladang jagung itu.

programme.title: Karnaval SCTV 2024 Ep24
programme.desc: Setiap tahun, tema Karnaval SCTV adalah berbeza! Acara ini mempersembahkan persembahan muzik yang paling menarik dengan menampilkan ramai pemuzik dan selebriti terkemuka negara.

programme.title: Confidential Assignment
programme.desc: When a crime organization from N. Korea crosses borders and enters S. Korea, a S. Korean detective must cooperate with a N. Korean detective to investigate their whereabouts.

programme.title: Joseon Chefs
programme.desc: A nobleman who has passed the national civil service exam meets the self-proclaimed best chef in Joseon, falls into the world of gourmet food, and sets out to find the life he truly wants.

programme.title: Beautiful Vampire
programme.desc: A beautiful 500-year-old vampire has her carefully constructed quiet life put in jeopardy when she becomes attracted to her landlady's doltish son.

programme.title: Set Me Free
programme.desc: Being abandoned in a group home since young, Young-Jae now struggles to make a living as he's too old to live there anymore.

programme.title: Beasts Clawing At Straws
programme.desc: Driven by their own desperate desires, the destinies of 8 down-on-their-luck individuals slowly converge and come crashing down while chasing after a mysterious money bag.

programme.title: Go Go 70S
programme.desc: In Korea, the 1970s were a time of military dictatorship and pop culture revolution. Sang-Kyu plans to do one last concert before more clubs close down due to military oppression.

programme.title: Ashfall
programme.desc: When a volcano straddling the ChinaNorth Korea border erupts, earthquakes ensue causing pandemonium in both North and South Korea.

programme.title: Voice Of A Murderer
programme.desc: The only son of a news anchor disappears without a trace. There is a veteran cop and his special task force assigned to this case, but there is an indication the kidnapper is aware of their presence.

programme.title: Enemies In-Law
programme.desc: Chul-soo, the son of a robber family, falls in love with Young-hee, a daughter from a cop family. To get married, he must pass the cop exam, but his parents try to stop him from doing both.

programme.title: My Perfect Roommate
programme.desc: Living with strangers becomes even more challenging when it comes to 70-year-old lady and young college boy.

programme.title: Return Of The Mafia
programme.desc: 10 years ago, the mafia family welcomed the entrepreneur Dae-suh as the son-in-law. They set up a company and Dae-Suh becomes the president. The family plot a conspiracy against him...

programme.title: Cadaver
programme.desc: 6 med students participate in their first anatomy class, yet nightmare begins when they are assigned with a deadly beautiful cadaver.

programme.title: The Moon
programme.desc: An astronaut is left stranded in space because of an accident during a spaceflight. The former director of the space centre strives to bring him home safely.

programme.title: Go Go 70S
programme.desc: In Korea, the 1970s were a time of military dictatorship and pop culture revolution. Sang-Kyu plans to do one last concert before more clubs close down due to military oppression.

programme.title: Love 911
programme.desc: A doctor tries to woo a grieving, widowed firefighter in her attempt to get him to testify on her behalf in a medical malpractice case.

programme.title: One Win
programme.desc: Woo-jin is the newly appointed manager of a girls' volleyball team which is going to disband. The new owner sold all ace players for money and asked the team to win at least once.

programme.title: Escape From Mogadishu
programme.desc: The ambassadors from North and South Korea in Somalia must join hands to escape from war-torn Somalia.

programme.title: The Negotiation
programme.desc: An arms dealer kidnapped two Koreans in Bangkok where the hostages were in fact held in an abandoned children's home in South Korea, when the kidnapper's motivations becomes clearer.

programme.title: Deadman
programme.desc: An ace in the barge business makes money by selling his name, is falsely accused of embezzling billions. He fights to reclaim his stolen life from those tied to him solely by name.

programme.title: The Chronicles Of Evil
programme.desc: A detective must untangle past mistakes to figure out why he was targeted at the first place and becomes the murderer of a taxi driver.

programme.title: Six Ball
programme.desc: Talented billiard player Sung-hoon hurt his left hand in a game because of Mr. Young's plan. He decided to take revenge on him and get ready for a final battle...

programme.title: Joseon Chefs
programme.desc: A nobleman who has passed the national civil service exam meets the self-proclaimed best chef in Joseon, falls into the world of gourmet food, and sets out to find the life he truly wants.

programme.title: Confidential Assignment 2: International
programme.desc: N. Korea detective returns for another secret mission. Despite having different underlying motives, 3 countries join forces to bring down an international crime organization.

programme.title: Double Patty
programme.desc: An aspiring news anchor and a struggling wrestler meets by chance at a burger joint. Through shared meals, they encourage each other to reach for their dreams!

programme.title: Enemies In-Law
programme.desc: Chul-soo, the son of a robber family, falls in love with Young-hee, a daughter from a cop family. To get married, he must pass the cop exam, but his parents try to stop him from doing both.

programme.title: My Perfect Roommate
programme.desc: Living with strangers becomes even more challenging when it comes to 70-year-old lady and young college boy.

programme.title: A Little Princess
programme.desc: A woman's life takes a turn for the better when she meets her granddaughter for the first time.

programme.title: Beasts Clawing At Straws
programme.desc: Driven by their own desperate desires, the destinies of 8 down-on-their-luck individuals slowly converge and come crashing down while chasing after a mysterious money bag.

programme.title: Rebound
programme.desc: A rookie basketball coach lead 6 'no-body' players for straight matches in 8 days and turn the impossible possible.

programme.title: Confidential Assignment
programme.desc: When a crime organization from N. Korea crosses borders and enters S. Korea, a S. Korean detective must cooperate with a N. Korean detective to investigate their whereabouts.

programme.title: Following
programme.desc: Real estate agent Jung-Tae has a penchant for spying. He discovers the death of the social media star So-Ra. He is falsely accused of murder and is determined to find the real culprit.

programme.title: Beautiful Audrey
programme.desc: Mi-yeon and her son Ki-hoon run a noodle restaurant. Her daughter, Ji-eun left for her dream. One day, Mi-yeon is diagnosed with a disease. Will this family be able to protect each other?

programme.title: Heo's Diner Ep4
programme.desc: Based on a web novel of the same name, a man from Joseon dynasty accidentally travels 400 years into the future and opens a restaurant unintentionally in modern Seoul.

programme.title: GBRB spinoff: Cafeteria Operation Ep1
programme.desc: Lee Kwang-soo and Doh Kyung-soo are reuniting to open a cafeteria inside the production company eggiscoming. What kind of meals will they prepare using the newly harvested potatoes from <3 Meals A Day: Light>?

programme.title: The Sound of Happiness (T) Ep17
programme.desc: Wu is a senior police officer has always wanted a son to carry his family name and join the force. However, he and wife are bequeathed with four daughters! As a doting father, his chief objective is to help them find happiness in their marriages. In this charming drama, Wu & his wife become their daughters greatest haven, through the ups and downs they face as married women.

programme.title: Stylish Man-The Chef (M) Ep4001
programme.desc: <Stylish Man - The Chef> is co-hosted by the Golden Bell Awards winner Sam Tseng and Genie Chuo, together with professional chef, James. programme.title: Blessing of Formosa (T) Ep268
programme.desc: The beauty of folklore is all around us in Taiwan, but we often overlook it and fail to appreciate and feel it. The aim of this program is to promote the beauty of Taiwanese folklore and bring folklore to life. This program showcases folk culture regardless of race or religion, and presents travel information in a fun way, combining easy-to-understand folk culture knowledge with the mission of passing on folk culture. The audience can learn more about folk cultural products such as handicrafts, antiques, temple folklore, as well as short stories about the gods, and information about local tourism. It is an educational and entertaining way to travel and learn about folklore.

programme.title: Have A Nice Dream (M) Ep55
programme.desc: Five young professionals with different life skills, team up for two days and one night trip, leading the audiance to explore the good life of nature and the beauty of the land of Taiwan. 5

programme.title: Way to Health (M) Ep353
programme.desc: This show invites top medical professionals from different fields to answer questions from the audience. Approved by the medical world, this show is an influential, as well as reliable place to understand more about ones health.

programme.title: Way to Health (M) Ep354
programme.desc: This show invites top medical professionals from different fields to answer questions from the audience. Approved by the medical world, this show is an influential, as well as reliable place to understand more about ones health.

programme.title: Top Singers (T) Ep662
programme.desc: The show 'Top Singers' aims to spotlight outstanding Taiwanese singers and composers, setting a new standard in the industry. Combining elements of competition, variety, and personal stories, the show welcomes participants of all ages. Its goals include discovering grassroots talent, innovating Taiwanese song performance styles, and involving more local talent in song composition to infuse new life into Taiwanese music.

programme.title: Show Biz (M) Ep1026
programme.desc: Every second counts in "Show Biz" to bring you with the most High Speed star news, exciting live shows and performers interviews.

programme.title: Dear Mom (M) Ep58
programme.desc: Feng-Yi Li handles everything in the house while her husband, Shu-An, lounges and daydreams. She constantly worries about the love lives of their four daughters. Yi-Wan starts a relationship with a gang leaders son despite claiming to have never dated. Qing-Qing may be having an affair with a married man. Xiao-Xi is infatuated with the school team captain but is unaware of "the others." An-Qing returns from the US with her son after a failed marriage. When Feng-Yi suddenly disappears, the sisters realize they've neglected their mother, who has always supported them. Now they must find her and get their lives back on track.

programme.title: The Ex-Files 4: Marriage Plan
programme.desc: Two brothers, Meng Yun and Yu Fei, are of marriageable age and are facing challenges in love. Yun dodges family pressure to marry after his breakup, while Fei and his girlfriend opt for a marriage cooling-off period to tackle marriage issues.

programme.title: Crypto Storm
programme.desc: ICAC investigation officer Lok sets up a special team to investigate a corruption case involving a banks top executives use of cryptocurrency to manipulate the trading market. When the banks chairman is kidnapped and kidnappers demand ransom in crypto coins, Lok connects the dots and vows to hunt down the mastermind behind both crimes.

programme.title: Band Four
programme.desc: An aspiring singer of an indie band called Band Four reunites with her estranged guitarist father following the death of her mother. Together with her half-sister and her nine-year-old son, the newly reunited family come together to support each other through their love and passion for music.

programme.title: Caught in Time
programme.desc: Based on true events, Detective Zhong Cheng leads a task force in pursuit of Eagle, a criminal gang led by Zhang Sun. Highly methodical and disciplined, the gang manages to avoid capture after each heist. A decade later, the need to stop Eagle is more urgent than ever when Zhong Cheng realizes that his time is almost up to solve the case.

programme.title: Where The Wind Blows
programme.desc: Founded in the 70s, Hong Kongs ICAC is committed to fight corruption in the police force. Detectives Lui Lok and Nam Kong build a corruption system that creates conflicts between the triad and the police. When ICAC hunts down the two, their control finally comes to an end. Where the wind blows, Hong Kong is no longer what it used to be!

programme.title: Moscow Mission
programme.desc: The story is based on a 1993 true event, the "China-Russia Train Robbery" where a gang of criminals commits a heist, stealing cash and goods from the cross border train. A Chinese police officer disguises as a businessman heads the operation to arrest the criminals, but uncovers a bigger conspiracy instead

programme.title: Ah Boys to Men
programme.desc: Ken is a rich and spoiled young man reluctant to be enlisted into National Service but must do so by law. He has to endure harsh training but it is made more bearable when he befriends three other recruits. When his girlfriend breaks up with him, Ken tries all ways to escape from camp so as to chase her back, but this leads to dire consequences

programme.title: Man on the Edge
programme.desc: On the eve of the 1997 handover, violence is rampant with triad forces causing chaos in Hong Kong. The triad gang leader assigns his right-hand man Ah Lok to take charge of the drug trafficking business. However, Ah Lok turns out to be an undercover police officer who unveils a shocking political conspiracy during the investigation.

programme.title: Binding Souls
programme.desc: Five old friends revisit their school before it closes down to find records of paranormal existence, including the mysterious case of a missing student. The school was previously occupied by the Japanese for various human experiments and is known to be haunted. Can the five friends get out of the school safely?

programme.title: Wolf Pack
programme.desc: The Wolf Pack squad led by Lao Diao, is a foreign-based team that specializes in overseas security jobs. In one of the missions, the squad discovers that a terrorist force is planning to destroy the countrys energy source. Lao Diao is now entrusted with the task of leading his squad to fight back. Can the Wolf Pack save the day?

programme.title: Bangkok Storm
programme.desc: Underground boxer Lin Feng is hunted by the Bangkok triad when he refuses to fight in an illegal match. He escaped successfully but lost his memory. While Feng begins a new life, the triad finds him and hires a top boxer to beat him. As Feng suddenly regains his memory in the process, he vows to take down the triad.

programme.title: Black Ransom
programme.desc: Mann, an accomplished police officer, has allowed his career to wane after his wife was murdered by the mafia. However, Mann is forced to return to his former glory when he is assigned to investigate a former police inspector suspected to be kidnapping mafia bosses and demanding ransoms in exchange for their lives.

programme.title: 97 Aces Go Places
programme.desc: Hao Shi becomes the new triad boss after his father is killed by the pretty swindler, Ling. While professional gunman Drunken Gun is tasked to help Hao Shi take revenge, Ling is hunted by gangster Lei, from whom she has conned 2 million dollars. In the process, Hao Shi and Drunken Gun accidentally arrest Lei instead...

programme.title: From Vegas to Macau III
programme.desc: Ken holds a wedding ceremony in Macau for his daughter Rainbow. However, an explosion during the wedding causes Rainbow to fall into coma, while Ken and his friend Mark, are accused of engulfing some illicit money. Enraged, Ken swears to seek vengeance and pursue the mastermind who has gotten them involved in his evil plan.

programme.title: Fight Back to School III
programme.desc: The millionaire, Million Wong , is found dead in a hotel room. Officer Sing Sing (Stephen Chow) is called in when a man is murdered with an ice pick during sexual intercourse. By an uncanny coincidence the man looks identical to Sing so the decision is made to send him in as an undercover again for further investigation. In the same day, he finds himself with a beautiful wife (Anita Mui), an incompetent sidekick (Anthony Wong) and one very unhappy girlfriend (Cheung Man). All this and somehow he still has to try and solve the case!

programme.title: Cloudy Mountain
programme.desc: When a decade-long tunnel project is about to complete, an earthquake strikes and leads to a series of subsidence and landslides. The tunnel and a nearby town are at stake. A retired soldier and his son step up to try and stop the disasters at source. Will the authority decide to blow up the tunnel to save the 160,000 people in town?

programme.title: Limbo
programme.desc: Hong Kong is rocked by a series of brutal murders committed by a serial killer. Veteran detective Cham and rookie cop Will are assigned to the case. During the investigation, they encounter Wang Tao, who accidentally killed Cham's wife. Seeking redemption, Wang assists them in tracking down the killer, but her involvement puts her in grave danger.

programme.title: Journey to the West: Conquering the Demons
programme.desc: The sequel to "Journey to the West: Conquering the Demons", this happens after Monkey King has gained enlightenment and is Tang San Zang's disciple. Tang, Monkey King, Sandy and Pigsy continue their journey to the West, where they have to fight and eliminate demons while dealing with their own changes, putting their bond to the test.

programme.title: Wolf Hiding
programme.desc: A cold-blooded killer, Chen An vows to take revenge for her sister who was killed by a crime gang. Dealing with the police and the triad at the same time, a final battle between good and evil has just begun!

programme.title: Cyber Heist
programme.desc: Hackers have caused a large-scale cyber attack, but luckily cyber security engineer Chun, manages to fend it off with his protective firewall system. To Chun's surprise, his boss is the mastermind of the attack, and when Chun gets trapped in a money laundering operation, he must fight against his boss in the cyber world to prove his innocence.

programme.title: Time Still Turns the Pages
programme.desc: High school teacher Cheng recalls his violent childhood memories when he finds an anonymous suicide note in the classroom. While he has to prevent the tragedy involving a suicidal student from happening, he also has to face a series of family problems with his wife wanting to divorce him and his fathers serious illness.

programme.title: Acting Out of Love
programme.desc: Wei Hung Jen is a struggling actor who gets fired but finds a job behind the scene. Hui Hsin, the associate producer, must write a script for a love story so as to get a reference letter to study scriptwriting overseas. As Jen falls for Hui, he invites her out on a date as a research for her script and they start acting out of love.

programme.title: Munitions Hijacking Case
programme.desc: Agent Wen is assigned to work undercover for a Southeast Asian military arm dealer to find some munitions and to destroy them. When he finally finds the munitions though, he is attacked by unknown gangsters and has to team up with his partner to recover the munitions so as to prevent a disaster from occurring.

programme.title: American Girl
programme.desc: 13 year-old Fen is uprooted from LA and moves to Taipei in early 2003, when her mother is diagnosed with breast cancer. She struggles to adjust to her new life with a new school and long-separated father, and drifts away from her mother. When her younger sister is misdiagnosed with SARS, they finally open up to each other during quarantine.

programme.title: CZ12
programme.desc: Hawk leads a mercenary team to recover the bronze heads of the 12 Chinese zodiac animals, which were looted by foreigners in the 1800s. With a promise of a 10 times bonus by MP Corp if he can recover all of them, Hawk stops at nothing to accomplish the mission.

programme.title: Someday or One Day
programme.desc: The movie is a spin-off from the TV series of the same name. While Huang Yu Xuan mourns the death of her boyfriend, she receives a mysterious cassette player that allows her to travel back in time. She meets her boyfriend then again, but will she be able to change his destiny?

programme.title: L Storm
programme.desc: ICAC Chief Officer Luk and Chief Inspector Lau both hit a dead end when investigating their respective bribery and money laundering cases. When Luk is accused of bribery after being framed by the money launderers, he risks everything he has to find crucial evidence against them to clear his name.

programme.title: Wu Kong
programme.desc: Set 500 years before the Monkey King Wu Kong wreaks havoc in the heavenly kingdom, the movie tells the story of how Wu Kong who, unwilling to bow to his own destiny, sets out to rebel against the gods.

programme.title: You are the One
programme.desc: A talented rogue trader experiences a 180-degree change in life when he encounters a girl who does not believe good things will happen to her. Will they fall in love? It seems like a Cinderellas adventure has just begun!

programme.title: The Captain
programme.desc: The movie is based on a real incident of Sichuan Airlines Flight 8633 on 14 May 2018. When the cockpit windshield shatters after takeoff, the Captain manages to land the airplane safely with his level-headed swift actions and sheer determination. This is lauded as a miracle in airline history.

programme.title: Infernal Affairs
programme.desc: Yan is a police mole in the triad and joined them before he graduated from the police academy, while Ming is a triad mole in the police since young. Leading parallel lives, both men feel increasingly trapped in their false surroundings, and a series of cat-and-mouse chases ensue as both the triad and the police compete to uncover the others mole.

programme.title: Rob N Roll
programme.desc: A ruthless bandit, Tian, has plotted an intense and quick armed robbery. When he encounters Hui and Shui who also plan for a robbery, they decide to team up for the heist. However, their ad-hoc and dramatic robbery has started a war with the police hot on pursuit, putting their lives on the line!

programme.title: The Gangster, the Cop, the Devil
programme.desc: The movie is adapted from real events. Detective Lin sets up a special unit to arrest the motorbike robber and the crime syndicate behind the thefts in Foshan. In the process, his pregnant wife is hit by a motorbike robber, leading him to uncover their revenge plan...

programme.title: The Warlord
programme.desc: A bandit became a warlord in northern China by helping Russia fight against Japan. Due to his ignorance and silly behaviour, he is seen as a joke to everyone. The warlord is finally killed by the daughter of a troupe master whom he had killed for no reason, bringing a befitting end to a traitor.

programme.title: Full Moon Scimitar
programme.desc: Swordsman Ding fought against many swordsmen and won, so he took his first defeat badly and wanted to commit suicide. It is then that he meets the granddaughter of a mystic Sect leader and falls in love. When they want to get married, the Sect leader presents Ding with the Full Moon Scimitar, on the condition that he will never leave the sect.

programme.title: The Younger Generation
programme.desc: A tragic tale about a young girl who gets married and has five kids. When she and her husband die, leaving all five kids behind to fend for themselves, the eldest child is forced to be sold into prostitution to feed the other four.

programme.title: Na Cha And The Seven Devils
programme.desc: While stealing one magical peach from a mystic tree in Heaven, Little Na Cha accidentally drops seven others on Earth, which transformed seven different animals into seven devils. Na Cha must hunt the devils down in ten days or his father will be punished by the King of Heaven. Can Na Cha complete his mission?

programme.title: The Grand Substitution
programme.desc: In this Opera epic, a loyal Imperial Court servant gives up his own newborn son to save the prince from an evil official.

programme.title: The Monkey Goes West
programme.desc: Adapted from the classic Chinese novel of the same title, the story follows Monk Tang San Zangs journey to the West in search of the Buddhist Sutra. On the way, he encounters and takes as disciples, Monkey, Pigsy and Sha Wu Jing.

programme.title: The Delightful Forest
programme.desc: The legendary hero Wu Sung is sent to a prison in Meng province after murdering his adulterous sister-in-law and her lover. While in prison, the officer Shih En spares Wu the humiliating baton punishment. Owing Shih a favour, Wu decides to help Shih get his restaurant back at all costs when it was forcefully taken over by a local thug.

programme.title: Brotherhood
programme.desc: Liu serves his triad society loyally and tries to live a respectable life, but over time his good intentions lead him to an all-out gang war with a startling conclusion.

programme.title: Emperor Chien Lung
programme.desc: Emperor Chien Lung goes incognito to mix with his people and understand their needs. He encounters many strange things along the way, including being arrested and nearly beheaded. Who will save him?

programme.title: Raw Passions
programme.desc: Mrs Lin's husband and his friend both have affairs with a belly dancer Sasa, and are both blackmailed by her. Sasa is stabbed one day and her brother shows up asking for money. A mysterious man also claims he can offer evidence for cash to help Lins husband. Lin has to unveil the deceit, double-crosses and blackmailing before she is in danger too!

programme.title: The Trail of the Broken Blade
programme.desc: Chivalrous swordsman Fung goes in search of another swordsman on the run, Li Yue, in order to reunite him with his love. Though both men meet and end up being close friends, Li Yue did not reveal his true identity until Fungs life is endangered by a gang looking for revenge...

programme.title: The Golden Sword
programme.desc: Swordsman Long meets Feng while searching for his missing father and they soon fall in love and marry. When Long is kidnapped by 'Dragon Gate Palace' one day, Feng embarks on a rescue mission and reunites with Long, who manages to escape. Together, they confront the head of 'Dragon Gate Palace', and uncover a long-hidden secret.

programme.title: The Mad Monk
programme.desc: The movie consists of four stories of the Mad Monk helping others, from saving a mother and daughter from crumbling walls, to helping hawkers deal with bullies, recovering stolen money for a young man and punishing a devious court official and his son.

programme.title: That Man In Chang-an
programme.desc: The Han Emperor dies and his Empress Lu seizes the ruling power. She plots to kill the heir to the throne, Liu Heng, but the masked warrior discovers her plot and tips off Liu. Liu sends his princess to Chang An to ask for help. The masked warrior protects the princess from attackers along the way and supports Liu to become the new Emperor.

programme.title: Apartment for Ladies
programme.desc: A Taiwanese singer comes to Hong Kong in search for her missing younger sister, who had arrived in Hong Kong to be discovered as a nightclub singer. She finds lodging at an apartment for women run by a man-hating landlady, Mrs Chan. However, Mrs Chan cannot confine the young ladies youthful vitality within the apartment.

programme.title: The Bride Napping
programme.desc: A rich girl Yue Ying, together with her maid Chun Lan, encounter a poor scholar Bian Ji at a fte. Chun Lan realizes Yue Ying is in love with him, but mixes his identity with a bandit due to an old servants confusion, threatening the couples union. After a series of complications, misunderstandings and mismatches, Chun Lan finally saves the day.

programme.title: Family Light Affair
programme.desc: Alfred Cheung Kin-ting returns to the screen with this seriocomic look at the clash of cultures which result when a Mainland Chinese peasant brings his family to Hong Kong. Family Light Affair, whose Chinese title literally translates as "City Lights", is the director/writer's warm-hearted memoir of street life back in the early 1980s, featuring an eclectic cast of pop music and kung fu stars who shine in their poignant roles.

programme.title: The Magnificent Trio
programme.desc: A group of farmers who are being oppressed by the local magistrates kidnap one of the magistrates daughter in the hope of being heard by the authorities. A wandering swordsman offers his help and aiding him are two fighters who have both switched sides from being the oppressors to the oppressed. The trio fight back against the magistrates!

programme.title: Hong Kong Rhapsody
programme.desc: Hong Kong rhapsody is a musical extravaganza full of song and dance! Peter Chen-Ho stars as a playboy magician who changes his ways after he becomes the guardian of a young singer (Li Ching), the daughter of a deceased magician friend.

programme.title: 7-Man Army
programme.desc: This iconoclastic film retells the legend of seven Chinese patriots, who sacrificed their lives to defend against 20,000 Japanese soldiers and 50 tanks for 5 days, at a strategic key point of the Great Wall known as Pa Tou Lou Tzu.

programme.title: The Pure and the Evil
programme.desc: Two teen girls, Rose and May, become close friends despite their different social backgrounds. The rich girl May moves to America but returns years later to see Rose, now a beauty queen and bar girl. Rose is immediately attracted to Fangs fianc and their relationship quickly deteriorates when Rose sets out to pursue him

programme.title: The Vengeful Beauty
programme.desc: The Flying Guillotine assassins are secretly working for the Emperor and its leader Jin is sent to kill Hon, who knows this secret. Hons pregnant wife Rong seeks to kill Jin but retreats to protect her unborn child. When she is hunted down herself, Rong hooks up with a former Flying Guillotine member and her martial arts senior to fight back...

programme.title: Tiger Killer
programme.desc: Wu Song is appointed as chief constable after killing a tiger with his bare hands when drunk. The wife of his brother Wu Da Lang, seduces Wu Song but gets rejected by him, and engages in an affair with a rich man. They poison Wu Da Lang when he finds out about their affair. To avenge his brothers death, Wu Song kills both of them.

programme.title: The Cave of Silken Web
programme.desc: In this third instalment of Shaw Brothers Journey to the West, Monk Tang San Zang is trapped by seven seductive spider spirits who are hell-bent on achieving immortality by eating him! Monkey, Pigsy and Sha Wu Jing have to fight the spider spirits to rescue Monk Tang San Zang.

programme.title: The Killer
programme.desc: Hsieh Choun, the Black Dragon, is in trouble with the police since Wang Sien Tien's gang is helping them; he is no longer free to conduct his drugs shipments out of the port freely as he used to. He buys more thugs and killers to dispose of the young upstart, and soon Wang is in dire straits, in the port of Hong Kong.

programme.title: The Mad Monk Strikes Again
programme.desc: The Mad Monk is up against the equally legendary scholar-turned-genie, Lu Tung Pin. The duo create havoc as they vie with each other, be it in mirth, magic, women or weapons!

programme.title: Flying Guillotine 2
programme.desc: In a time of anti-Manchu sentiment, Emperor Yong Zheng employs his ruthless Blood Hound Corps to silence any dissenters. Only one man and his signature weapon, The Flying Guillotine, stand in their way.

programme.title: Forever Diamonds
programme.desc: Hua, a pretty fraud, steals a brilliant diamond ring from a shop in Hong Kong and escapes to Singapore. To smuggle the ring pass customs, Hua slips it into the pocket of a stranger, Yen, but then lost track of him. Hua finally spots Yen after searching for days and does everything to get close to him in order to take the ring back.

programme.title: Invincible Shaolin
programme.desc: An evil Qing general comes up with a plan to rid the Shaolin masters once and for all. He invites three Northern Shaolin experts to fight against three Southern Shaolin disciples. After the contest, the general secretly kills the Southerners and places the blame on the Northerners. This leads to in-fighting between both Shaolin schools.

programme.title: The Perfumed Arrow
programme.desc: A charming Huangmei Opera title, this is the story of Fei E, a Generals daughter who grows up fooling everyone that she is a boy, including her two closest schoolmates. When she has to choose one of them to marry, how will Fei E tell them that she is a girl? To complicate matters, a girl who Fei E saves one day only wants to be married to her!

programme.title: The Fastest Sword
programme.desc: Southern Swordsman Ting is named The Fastest Sword but is defeated by a street monk and has to fulfil his promise of working on stone craving with the monk for three years. Ting returns home to lead a peaceful life after that and declines all fight challenges. Even so, he is forced to fight the Northern Swordsman. Who will win finally?

programme.title: The Dancing Millionairess
programme.desc: Peter was a key dancer in a dance troupe and applied to be the chauffeur of a rich girl, Betty. When he is rumoured to be her lover, Betty is furious and goes undercover as a reporter to investigate the rumour. They fall in love in the process, and after putting Peter through many tests, they finally seal their love with a dance.

programme.title: The Brave Archer 2
programme.desc: Knowing Guo Jing has won Huang Rongs hand in marriage using the kung fu learned from Jiu Yin manual, Ouyang Feng captures Huang and agrees to release her only if Guo can dictate the content of the manual. Will Guo give in to the threat?

programme.title: The Dream of the Red Chamber
programme.desc: Adapted from the most widely read and filmed novel in Chinese history, this version is said to be the most successful one. Betty Lohs looks, demeanour and aura in her portrayal of Lin Dai Yu has won her the epithet "Classic Beauty".

programme.title: Sab Jholmaal Hai Ep74
programme.desc: A hilarious animal chase comedy about the secret life and adventures of a dog, a parrot and twin bobcats living with Ms Katkar.

programme.desc: ACP Yashwardhan, a dutiful and honest police officer, teams up with RAW agent Kamaljit Kaur to expose an inside informer who leaks sensitive information to a foreign agency targeting the RAW agents.

programme.title: Mary Kom
programme.desc: When Mary Kom encounters a renowned coach in a boxing gym, she shares her boxing aspirations with him and convinces him to teach her. Despite her father's disapproval, she follows her passion.

programme.title: Phir Hera Pheri

programme.title: Columbo S3 Ep01
programme.desc: Lovely But Lethal-A cosmetics manufacturer is suspected of murdering an employee (Martin Sheen) who stole a wrinkle-removing formula.

programme.title: Columbo S3 Ep02
programme.desc: Any Old Port... Storm-A suave wine connoisseur commits fratricide when he discovers his brother plans to sell the family winery.

programme.title: Hawaii Five-O S1 Ep24
programme.desc: Cocoon - Part 1-Steve McGarrett is the head of a special investigator unit of the Hawaii State Government. McGarrett probes the death of a close friend, only to discover that the man did not drown as was commonly believed. Clues lead to a foreign ship in the harbor manned by an unusual crew.

programme.title: Hawaii Five-O S1 Ep25
programme.desc: Cocoon - Part 2-Steve McGarrett is the head of a special investigator unit of the Hawaii State Government. McGarrett probes the death of a close friend, only to discover that the man did not drown as was commonly believed. Clues lead to a foreign ship in the harbor manned by an unusual crew.

programme.title: Married... With Children S1 Ep01
programme.desc: Married... With Children-Peggy forces Al to sacrifice a basketball game and spend a torturous evening in conversation with new neighbors, idealistic newlyweds Steve and Marcy Rhoades.

programme.title: Married... With Children S1 Ep02
programme.desc: Thinergy-At the suggestion of her next-door-neighbor Marcy, Peggy goes on a "thinergy" diet in hopes of rekindling the flame in Al.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit S9 Ep06
programme.desc: Svengali-When a college student is found murdered, Detectives Benson and Stabler recognize the body's mutilation as a copycat of serial killer. Cecilia, the last person to see the victim alive, suddenly goes missing herself.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit S9 Ep07
programme.desc: Blinded-When Detectives Olivia and Elliot discover a kidnapped girl in the trunk of a stolen rental car, they are led to her abductor named Saul Picard. The trial drives A.D.A. Novak to face her own dark past.

programme.title: The Nanny S2 Ep04
programme.desc: Everybody Needs A Bubby Sometimes-Told that her grandmother needs to be out of her retirement home while it is being sprayed for termites, Fran is surprised to discover Yetta thinks she will be staying with the Sheffields.

programme.title: The Nanny S2 Ep05
programme.desc: The Nanny Napper-With a Gay Pride Parade clogging the streets, Fran is forced to take the Sheffield children for an unaccustomed ride on the subway.

programme.title: The Nanny S2 Ep06
programme.desc: Pishke business-During a tour of the Sheffield home, Sylvia and her friends are delighted to see actor Ben Vereen. Claiming he has agreed to star in his next play, Maxwell notes that the financing for his sure-fire hit has yet to be secured.

programme.title: The Nanny S2 Ep07
programme.desc: Take Back Your Mink-As Fran is getting ready to attend the funeral of her great aunt Mimma Fayga, Maggie criticizes her frequent use of hair care products.

programme.title: The Nanny S2 Ep08
programme.desc: Stock Tip-Always on the lookout for a potential husband, Fran takes Grace along with her to their neighborhood's upscale supermarket to see what she can find.

programme.title: The Six Million Dollar Man S3 Ep10
programme.desc: Stranger In Broken Fork-Steve, suffering from amnesia following an accident, finds himself defending a woman who has befriended him.

programme.title: The Six Million Dollar Man S3 Ep11
programme.desc: The Peeping Blonde-Kidnappers plan to nab Steve and send him to a foreign power.

programme.title: The Six Million Dollar Man S3 Ep12
programme.desc: The Cross Country Kidnap-Steve's attempt to protect a computer expert from being kidnapped is thwarted by the woman herself.

programme.title: Amazing Animal Friends S1 Ep2
programme.desc: A Friend in Need - Meet more Amazing Animal Friends including Charlotte, a schnauzer who enjoys bath time with her guinea pig pal Wallace, and a randy ram called Hamish who likes to sneak off to live with a herd of dairy cows instead of his own kind.

programme.title: Wild Latin America S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Realm of the Spectacled Bear - Get to know South Americas only bear species. Witness the shy and charismatic spectacled bear play, forage, and look for mates at the secluded Chaparri Ecological Reserve in Northern Peru.

programme.title: Macaque Island S1 Ep1
programme.desc: The Young Up-Start - Explore the lush treed cityscape where fluffy male Matnoor rules over the 30-member-strong Street Troop with an iron fist. Then meet Aarav, the old alpha who oversees the wilder Hill Troop. Which will up-and-comer Loci challenge for the crown?

programme.title: The Hungry Games: Alaska's Big Bear Challenge S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Slammin' Salmon - Join the frantic dash to cash in on Julys salmon run with the Stage 1 winners and some tough new recruits. Tag along on BigBoi's food-finding road trip, welcome QuadMom and RedBack to the feast, and see if BoldFace can keep her surviving cub safe.

programme.title: Orangutan Jungle School S3 Ep5
programme.desc: Absent Friends - Hunt for missing nursery-class orphan Lahei and see shy Rumba try her weak left hand in a nest-building session. Watch younger Delilah school Bumi in class, then find out if Beni and Valentino will make the grade and finally earn their freedom.

programme.title: Orangutan Jungle School S3 Ep6
programme.desc: Graduation Day - Congratulate the new Orangutan Jungle School graduates, who arent all spring chickens. Follow the convoy to the release site, where the team bids their friends a poignant farewell, then enjoy raucous celebrations as Molly and Bumi move up a grade.

programme.title: Extreme Africa S1 Ep4
programme.desc: The Southern Drylands - The Southern Drylands is a journey into the most arid and extreme environments in the furthest reaches of southern Africa. We go to spectacular but treacherous places where almost no rain falls, to find incredibly resilient creatures and learn the secrets to their survival. From the largest mammals to the fastest insects and even a ghost-like fish found nowhere else in the world, the Southern Drylands contain some extraordinary inhabitants, all connected by the daily challenges of living in some of most inhospitable habitats in the world.

programme.title: Animal Senses S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Touch - The sense of touch is useful to feel physical forces such as bites, changes in temperature and texture. Some animals have become extra sensitive to very faint vibrations, which gives them a lot of information about their environment.

programme.title: Africa's Hunters S3 Ep6
programme.desc: Buffalo Showdown - To the lion, the buffalo is not only a satisfying dinner but also dangerous. Track a herd of 300 buffalo along with the Mwamba pride, who must act quickly and carefully if they are to take down their prey.

programme.title: Chasing the Rains S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Praying for Rain - Trail Anastasia as her herd splits to protect two precious elephant calves, while Kuleta retakes territory for her remaining cheetah cubs. Join wild dog Phoenixs search for a new mate as the skies open up and rain begins to heal the parched land.

programme.title: Chasing the Rains S1 Ep4
programme.desc: The Inside Story - Look behind the scenes and meet the innovative teams working to preserve and protect Kenyas wildlife. Check out Save the Elephants radio-tracking-collar system, a drone that monitors wild dog packs, and a local team of Maasai cheetah trackers.

programme.title: Extreme Africa S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Etosha: The Great White Place - Etosha was once a great lake that dried up and now only fills with water seasonally during the summer rains. Once the Etosha pan is full of water, a myriad of water birds congregate in the shallow lake to breed, most notably Greater and lesser flamingos.

programme.title: Amazing Animal Friends S1 Ep3
programme.desc: The Young Ones - In this episode of Amazing Animal Friends a rescued orphaned rhino befriended by a playful dog and doting sheep, a big bunny rabbit that babysits boisterous baby lambs, and a porcupine that helps two English bulldogs rehabilitate injured animals.

programme.desc: So Long and Thanks for All the Fish - Bundle up as an icy October storm complicates the race to the finish line. programme.title: Ireland's Wild Islands with Eoin Warner S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Sea of Serpents - Begin on Rathlin, where flightless guillemot chicks take a leap of faith and golden hares welcome the dawn. Head to Tory to see basking sharks, dolphins, and the endangered corncrakes dance of love. Then chase adorable Irish stoats across Achill.

programme.title: Animal Senses S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Sight - Seeing the world is one of the most amazing animal adaptations. Different types of eyes give animals different types of vision, and in some cases they can be extraordinary.

programme.title: Valley of Flood and Fire S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Emerald Season - Its the end of November in the Luangwa Valley, and the rains have just begun. It marks the end of one of the toughest dry season on record, and triggers a transition from parched wilderness to luscious wetland.

programme.title: Wild Rockies S1 Ep1
programme.desc: The Borderlands - Where the mountains cross international borders, herds of elk and moose live side by side with predators like bears and wolves. The predator/prey relationship is a delicate balance, and the perfect place to see it in action is the Kootenay area of the Rocky Mountains.

programme.title: Wild Rockies S1 Ep2
programme.desc: In the Peaks - The air is thin and cold, trees cant even live here - its not exactly a welcoming place to live. But animals like mountain goats and bighorn sheep and even black bears manage to skitter around these peaks with ease. Well take a look at how these creatures manage to defy gravity, among some of the highest peaks on the continent.

programme.title: Wild Rockies S1 Ep3
programme.desc: The Waterways - Some of mightiest rivers in North America originate on the glacial heights of the Rocky Mountains. The lakes, rivers and marshes of the Rockies are like arteries pulsing through the landscape, feeding the creatures that call the mountains home. Fed by glaciers and motivated by gravity, these waterways are split by the massive Rockies, which divert flow into the Atlantic, Pacific, and Arctic Oceans. From the uninhabitable icy pecks, water melts off glaciers, runs down thunderous waterfalls, filters through wetlands, sculpts the terrain, and finally flows out to the ocean, sustaining life and transforming environments along the way.

programme.title: Wild Rockies S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Balancing the Forest - Survival in the forest means maintaining a delicate balance between growth and destruction and death and rebirth - a forest should be in a constant state of regeneration. When trees get too tall they block all the sunlight from hitting the ground, which means grasses and smaller shrubs cant grow, diminishing habitat for animals like elk, moose, caribou, and wolves.

programme.title: Wild Rockies S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Group Survival - For a great many species, the structures of group living are the most important for survival. Although social living is integral to many of the animals that call the Rocky Mountains home, no two species organize their society in the same way. Even among closely related species there can be drastic differences in social structure; communication, hierarchy, mating, and diet are all inextricably informed by specific environmental and genetic adaptations for group survival.

programme.title: The Living Beach S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Florida - Florida is famous for its sandy shoresand theres plenty to go around. Florida has the most tidal shoreline of any state in the continental USA. These ocean-side playgrounds are also critical habitats for threatened and endangered species.

programme.title: Extreme Africa S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Dragon Mountain: Surviving the Summit - South Africa's Drakensberg is one of the continent's most impressive landscapes. It is home to sharp climatic and ecological gradients as physical conditions change for both land-based creatures and the Raptors that swirl in the skies above.

programme.title: Extreme Africa S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Lake Manyara National Park - In north Tanzania, towering mountains line a dramatic valley. Enriched by ancient volcanoes, its slopes provide a variety of habitats for life to thrive and its great centerpiece holds water through even the driest of times.

programme.title: Extreme Africa S1 Ep3
programme.desc: The Simien Mountains - Simien Mountains National Park in Ethiopia is home to some of the rarest creatures on earth. Take a glimpse into life on some of the highest peaks in Africa, in the last stronghold of shaggy, grass-grazing Geladas, elusive Simien wolves and horned Walia ibex.

programme.title: Extreme Africa S1 Ep4
programme.desc: The Southern Drylands - The Southern Drylands is a journey into the most arid and extreme environments in the furthest reaches of southern Africa. We go to spectacular but treacherous places where almost no rain falls, to find incredibly resilient creatures and learn the secrets to their survival. From the largest mammals to the fastest insects and even a ghost-like fish found nowhere else in the world, the Southern Drylands contain some extraordinary inhabitants, all connected by the daily challenges of living in some of most inhospitable habitats in the world.

programme.title: Extreme Africa S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Etosha: The Great White Place - Etosha was once a great lake that dried up and now only fills with water seasonally during the summer rains. Once the Etosha pan is full of water, a myriad of water birds congregate in the shallow lake to breed, most notably Greater and lesser flamingos.

programme.title: Kingdom of the Tide
programme.desc: Low tide exposes a band of shore called the intertidal zone. Its a place of stunning extremes, attacked by hurricane force waves and exposed to baking heat. Creatures here have evolved in countless bizarre ways. Scientists explore this alien realm.

programme.title: Beasts of the Big Blue S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Snares Islands/ Tini Heke - Venture to the pristine wilderness of the Snares Islands, a remote animal sanctuary protected from the turbulent sea. Hop along with a colony of Snares crested penguins, soar with giant petrels and sooty shearwaters, and roar with giant sea lions.

programme.title: Beasts of the Big Blue S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Otago Peninsula/ Muaupoko - Set sail for New Zealands Otago Peninsula, a breeding refuge for endangered seabirds and marine mammals. Watch as sea lions, albatrosses, red-billed gulls, white-fronted terns, and fairy prions find mates, then nurture the next generation.

programme.title: Beasts of the Big Blue S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Top of the South/ Te Tau Ihu - Uncover a land of opposites atop New Zealands South Island, where one of the worlds longest sandbars attracts bar-tailed godwits and hungry pilot whales, and drowned river valleys provide a buffet for dusky dolphins and New Zealand fur seals.

programme.title: Beasts of the Big Blue S1 Ep4
programme.desc: The Hauraki Gulf/ Te Moananui a Toi - Take a deep dive into the teeming waters of the Hauraki Gulf, near Auckland, New Zealand, and explore a true paradise for ocean creatures. Catch a glimpse of a stealthy manta ray, enjoy dolphin antics, and admire a kaleidoscope of tropical fish.

programme.title: Beasts of the Big Blue S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Three Kings Islands/ Manawatwhi - Delve into the strange magic of the Three Kings Islands, a remote archipelago north of New Zealand. Swim with a pod of bottlenose dolphins, join short-tailed stingrays on a hunt, and feel the tension as a gang of predatory orcas arrives on the scene.

programme.title: Beasts of the Big Blue S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Cook Islands/ Kki 'Airani - Travel to the Cook Islands, the destination of choice for 3,000 humpback whales ready to mate and raise their young. Witness giant clams and green turtles thriving in the islands massive coral reef and get a glimpse into our evolutionary past.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go! Ep7
programme.desc: Ding Dong Day \ Grand Sam - Its Pawstons annual Take Your Kid to Work Day, and its Tags year to spend the day at the Doorbell Store with Paw. \ Sam Whippet challenges the Not Yet Cadets to complete an obstacle course in the woods.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go! Ep8
programme.desc: Clucky Day \ Take Me Out to the Fetch Game - Scooch is bummed out because hes missing his favorite holiday back in his old farm town, so Tag wants to cheer him up by rounding up some chickens and bringing Clucky Day to Pawston. \ When theres a schedule mix-up and the Pawston Get Sox players think they have a day off, its up to Tag and Scooch to round up all five players in time for the fetch game, so that they dont have to forfeit.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep19
programme.desc: FOMO-OPUP / Lost in the Woods - Poppy and Archer get lost in Troll Forest together during one of his escape attempts and must learn to trust each other/Obsessed with finding Nova Swift's next pop-up party, Guy Diamond enlists the Snack Pack to help him on the hunt

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep20
programme.desc: Party Crashed - When the Party Crashers invade Troll Village, they trap Poppy and Branch, party throughout the village, and challenge the Trolls to a dramatic sing-off

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep19
programme.desc: That's Sooo Rob - Juliens former BFF, Rob, returns to lure the king away from his royal responsibilities and back to his crazy partying days.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep20
programme.desc: The Man In The Iron Booty - King Julien sends his entire kingdom away on rafts to help an alleged fellow king who is supposedly in distress.

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants Ep12
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Sickening Fumes of Smartsy Fartsy - In order to retrieve Mr. Krupps locked up rule book, George and Harold use an invention that ends up turning against them

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants Ep13
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Troublesome Treachery of the Thieving Toot Fairy - George and Harold race against Mr. Krupp to try to get him fired before they get expelled

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep10
programme.desc: Sword - Dulcinea pulls a magical sword from a stone and becomes enchanted with heroic powers; Puss must help her learn how to control her newfound strength.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal Ep10
programme.desc: Talent Show / Sad Sad Plant - Kelp writes a song about him and Scallop to perform at the unicorn show. But when it comes time, Scallop wants to keep the song just for them, leaving Kelp to come up with anew act- and fast! / The kids all visit the magical musical plant greenhouse on Unicorn Land. They each pick a plant to take care of, and for Kelp its a sad, almost dead plant that he falls in love with.

programme.title: Dew Drops Diaries Ep10
programme.desc: Things That Go Bump / Hide Like a Dew Drop - When "something" starts snatching things and causing havoc in Marcus' house, Phoebe and the Dew Drops investigate only to find that it's a stray kitten that they need to catch and find a home for before Marcus returns home. But in the end, Marcus decides to take the kitty in, as his own. / Lola isn't very good at Hide & Seek so the Dew Drops help her improve her game. But she becomes so good that no one can find her! And now shes going to be late to her own surprise tea party!

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep10
programme.desc: Slobber Power - Cutter gets a chance to be a "mom" when a newly hatched dragon bonds with him, and they'll both be needed to get the others out of a tangled mess.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go! Ep8
programme.desc: Clucky Day \ Take Me Out to the Fetch Game - Scooch is bummed out because hes missing his favorite holiday back in his old farm town, so Tag wants to cheer him up by rounding up some chickens and bringing Clucky Day to Pawston. \ When theres a schedule mix-up and the Pawston Get Sox players think they have a day off, its up to Tag and Scooch to round up all five players in time for the fetch game, so that they dont have to forfeit.

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants Ep32
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Savage Spite of the Slimy Salamangler - Krupp's campers take on rich rivals in a hoity-toity boat race that also features a revenge-obsessed giant salamander. Paging Captain Underpants!

programme.title: Abominable And The Invisible City Ep7
programme.desc: Yeti Superstitious - Right before basketball tryouts, Peng learns from NaiNai that it is his big bad year on the zodiac calendar which means bad luck. Peng is skeptical at first, but after seeing the positive effects of adhering to NaiNais superstitions, he dives headfirst into learning all he can to secure his spot on the team. Eventually, he becomes so consumed that he breaks up with Yi and Jin because of their zodiac incompatibility. Cut from tryouts, Peng eventually realizes with the help of his friends that he went overboard and he has more to offer than just basketball.

programme.title: Abominable And The Invisible City Ep8
programme.desc: Toad-al Recall - A wish-granting toad drops into Yi and the crews life just as the dumpling shop is being reviewed by a food magazine writer. Overwhelmed by her efforts to help her mom and NaiNai in the shop, Yi asks the toad to spit up helpful items but Jin and Peng arent so selfless. As a result of granting an abundance of wishes for the whole crew, the toad becomes too weak to continue. Realizing the error of their ways and why the toad appeared in the first place, Yi and Everest use their magic to reverse the toads magic onto himself so he can wish himself home.

programme.title: Dragons: Riders Of Berk Ep10
programme.desc: Heather Report Part I - Hiccup and the gang befriend a beautiful stranger who has a dangerous secret.

programme.title: Dragons: Riders Of Berk Ep11
programme.desc: Heather Report Part II - Hiccup and the gang infiltrate the outsiders in order to free Heathers parents.

programme.title: Dragons: Riders Of Berk Ep12
programme.desc: Thawfest - Hiccup tries to best Snotlout during the Thaw Games, the Vikings annual sports competition.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In The Crib Ep60
programme.desc: Sitting Ducks - Boss, Tina, JJ, Dez and Pip willfully get babysat by the Uncuddleables, planning to expose them as horrible sitters via secret, hidden cameras. But the plan is thrown for a loop when Tina's first night alone without her parents makes her fall for their sitter Mia as a "substitute mommy." Meanwhile, Nannycam uses the babysitting distraction to sneak into the Uncuddleables' secret garage hideout to gather intel with her own "B field team."

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In The Crib Ep61
programme.desc: The Big Dumpling - The Uncuddleables have struck the Lil Dumpling baby pageant, replacing all of Baby Corp's super-cute top 5%er babies with not-cute bottom 5%ers. Boss, Tina and their field team race to caravan the 5%ers from their homes to the pageant before Nannycam deploys the nuclear option of unleashing the dangerously cute UBO on stage to salvage a Lil Dumpling win.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In The Crib Ep62
programme.desc: The Great Medieval London Fire 1135 - Boss Baby and Tina reject the 5%er system that says the cuter you are, the more love you deserve. Teaming up with the Uncuddleables, the team tries to take down the system from within, forming a resistance of the eight department heads of Baby Corp in the hopes of changing the way we look at Baby Love forever.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep28
programme.desc: The English Opening - There is more epic action and intrigue as Po and the Dragon Knights continue their quest to destroy the Tianshang weapons, but find themselves in treacherous waters when they are captured by pirates, one of which is out for revenge against Mr. Ping! The adventures lead them to London, where they are wanted by the Knights. Old enemies resurface and Blade will have to face one of her most challenging opponentsher mom. And somehow, Po finds himself in a chess tournament against the Queen of England!

But Melvin creates an invention to suck all the trash into another dimension. The plan backfires when Tubbadump, a trash-covered monster, emerges from that dimension for revenge on the trashmakers.
